messages.message:
@Brian I am finding it hard to replicate this issue. Can you record a video and share it here?

Also can you try the same in UAT and share your feedback?

I wasn't able to reproduce the issue during a bug hunting session, but I did send over a video recording of me interacting with Converse and how the UI responds/displays the count... + other potential unrelated issues that may be helpful to note? :bug_red:
... of course, I wasn't able to reproduce it in Prod, and so I didn't try it in UAT.
